channel.title: How do i make a compiler?
channel.description: i was wondering how do i make a compiler?i used taharoks and it still didnt work for me...

item.title: How do i make a compiler?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Make a new txt doc. Name it whatever.bat. Edit it and put this in there:

@echo off title Waffles!! Help me make this! javac *.java
Then you could turn that into this:

@echo off :menu title Main Menu cls echo Type Run to Run echo Type Compile to Compile echo Type Colors to pick different Colors echo. set /p c=Which one? if %c%==Run goto Run if %c%==Compile goto Compile if %c%==Color goto Color :Compile title Compiler cls javac *.java pause goto menu :Run title Run cls set CLASSPATH= java server :Color cls echo Pick a text color: echo. echo Red echo Blue echo Green echo Dark_Blue echo Normal echo Purple echo. set /p c=Which color? if %c%==Red color 4 if %c%==Blue color 3 if %c%==Green color 2 if %c%==Dark_Blue color 1 if %c%==Purple color 5 if %c%==Normal color 7 goto Menu

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a compiler?
